mode

Class AbstractMode

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.TimerTask
      • mode.AbstractMode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ManualMode, Mode

    public abstract class AbstractMode
extends java.util.TimerTask
    This abstract class is used to be the base class for AutoMode, UserMode. Also this class is also extends TimerTask.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AbstractMode() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void checkConsumption()
      checkConsumption() is used to check consumption if the current consumption is higher than the upper consumption, if higher, then close the device in a priority queue which user inputs.
      void checkTemperature(int currentTem)
      checkTemperature(int) is used to check temperature if the current temperature is higher than the upper temperature, if higher, then close device 1 which is identified the heater.
      abstract int getAllConsumption()
      getAllConsumption() is used to get all consumption from database
      abstract void initial()
      initialState() is used to read the (mode)_config.csv file, and store the information into hashmap.
      abstract long updateHistory()
      updateHistroy() is used to get a long value for all devices' consumption.
      abstract void updateMYSQLCurrentDevice(int counter)
      updateMYSQLCurrentDevice(int) is used to update value for each device's consumption

        public AbstractMode()

    • Method Detail

      • initial

        public abstract void initial()
        initialState() is used to read the (mode)_config.csv file, and store the information into hashmap.

      • getAllConsumption

        public abstract int getAllConsumption()
        getAllConsumption() is used to get all consumption from database
        Returns:
        consumption

      • checkTemperature

        public void checkTemperature(int currentTem)
        checkTemperature(int) is used to check temperature if the current temperature is higher than the upper temperature, if higher, then close device 1 which is identified the heater. else then open device 1

      • checkConsumption

        public void checkConsumption()
        checkConsumption() is used to check consumption if the current consumption is higher than the upper consumption, if higher, then close the device in a priority queue which user inputs. The device in priority queue is identified when the consumption is higher, which device the user want to close first.

      • updateHistory

        public abstract long updateHistory()
        updateHistroy() is used to get a long value for all devices' consumption. The return value is used to be passed as a parameter into connect.insert(long) method
        Returns:
        long

      • updateMYSQLCurrentDevice

        public abstract void updateMYSQLCurrentDevice(int counter)
        updateMYSQLCurrentDevice(int) is used to update value for each device's consumption
